reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For...
reviews.text: Some friends and I decided to stay at this hotel because it was cheaper than the one we were staying at previously. When we first entered the room, a lady came in to spray the room with some air freshener, which we found a little odd. The rooms did have a weird smell to them. There were dark stains in the green carpets, pretty big holes in the ceiling of the bathrooms & the water pressure in the bath was really low in one of the rooms. Beside the Lobby, the hotel was a little eerie as well.
I've been to other Hotels in Bangkok, I wouldn't recommend this one.
reviews.title: Old hotel with small coachroaches
